attributes.action: Recognise Enlish Language not being used in Care Homes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sick and tired of struggling to understand what the Foreign Carers are trying to say to me when i am working with them.
 I feel sorry for the Elderly patients who cannot understand a word when they are being spoken to by one of the Eastern Europeans.
 I feel these so called care homes should make sure that there Employees speak English before employing them, I am speaking from 15 years service within the care sector and it is just getting worse.
 Just think about it, you will be in one one day........

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
